mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectBskCpstGodCnnc Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ BSK_NO , GOD_TURN , CPST_GOD_TURN , PCKAGE_GOD_TP_CD , CPST_GOD_QTY , SORT_SEQ , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM BSK_CPST_GOD_CNNC WHERE 1 = 1 AND BSK_NO = #{bskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND GOD_TURN = #{godTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND CPST_GOD_TURN = #{cpstGodTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
